author: taylor
msg: - Fixed bug with Tutorial (or any other Jetspeed app) not supporting more than one language bundle file
This was introduced with the Custom Localization patch
Custom Localization now inherits from Turbine's localization service
There are still many places where Localization is used in Jetspeed, not CustomLocalization

There can still be a problem if someone goes back to Turbine Localization, since with the Custom Localization patch, there are direct casts to CustomLocalization, without ever considering if the Turbine Localization is selected

author: jford
msg: Added templates to show exception in browser without causing Turbine to produce a HorribleException

msg: Added client entry for the opera browser
